meanings.definition: A pet, especially a dog or cat, that is treated like a member of the family.
meanings.sent1: My furkid loves to cuddle on the couch with me.
meanings.sent2: She considers her furkid a part of the family.
meanings.sent3: When my furkid stole my sock, it was like a playful game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The bond between a furkid and their owner is as strong as any family tie.
meanings.sent5: Every day, my furkid greets me with wagging tail and joyful barks.

meanings.sent1: Taking care of my furkid brings me so much joy.
meanings.sent2: She considers her furkid her best friend.
meanings.sent3: My furkid's antics always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: In times of sadness, a furkid's presence can be a comforting embrace.
meanings.sent5: The love between a furkid and their human is unconditional and pure.
